extendedInfo.description: ******YOU MUST REBOOT AFTER APPLYING FOR CHANGES TO TAKE EFFECT!!!!************Requires TMobile's Theme Engine found in CyanogenMod's Roms**********Requires Root**********HDPI only**********PLEASE FOLLOW INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS IF THIS YOUR FIRST TIME INSTALLING A tHEME FOR THE THEME ENGINE**********Free Version, We also have a Donate Version with the same Features*********Now wallpaper pick included*******Must install theme chooser wallpaper app from the market to select wallsThis will theme your phone with over 1800 different images, hitting all system apps and many 3rd party apps.Including but no limited to:Android SystemCalendarCameraContactsDeskclockDocs (google)EqualizerFace BookFlext9FM RadioGmailMarketMessagingMusic (stock)News and WeatherPandoraPhonePlumeSettingsTalkTweetDeckYou Tubeand many more!****No Icons Are themed***********Install Instructions*****0. Uninstall any non market version you might have of this theme(will not apply to everyone)1. Install the app2. Open up the Theme chooser in your app drawer3. Choose "SynErgy" and hit apply4. Very important after you apply You must reboot for all changes to take effect.****Notes about Screen Shots. They were taking using different elements of our theme.  1. Beautiful Widgets (in Market) with The Steel beast skin2. ADWEX (in Market) with custom Synergy icons and dock (coming soon)3. Audio Manager pro (in Market)  With our Synergy Theme (search BSthemes)****Wallpaper contributors******@Jaithemes  Thank you bro for all you do for the community@Cory_Dowd@Maizekidstill81 We want to thank all our testers and end users for the support they Offer.Also Please if you feel the need download our Donate version as this theme has been months in the Making.Thank you all!  Brian, Steve, Corey, and Alex  (BSThemes)Special thanks to @Maizekidstill81  for the theme preview imageSpecial Thanks To Jess For her Brilliance and support ______________________________________________Keywords:CM7 themes, CM7, Cyanogen, CyanogenMod, Linear, BSthemes, ADW, ADWEX, Theme Engine, Tmobile, T mobile, Synergy

reviews.title: My favorite theme.
reviews.comment: My only dislike is the Green 4G icon on my Evo 4G it really clashes with the blues and silver. :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It looks nice but doesnt function well
reviews.comment: After installing and rebooting, all the changes made don\'t stick and then makes LP reboot. Looks nice though. CM 7.1 RC.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Theme,  Makes my zte blade look brand new.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love It
reviews.comment: This is by far the best cm7 theme I\'ve ever installed. Great quality, widgets are themed as well, excellent wallpapers, top notch functionality & I adore the blinking notifications. Wonderful job on this theme. It actually makes me want to use my phone twice as much.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The hottest CM7 theme
reviews.comment: Very well made, looks good, high attention to detail.  Not inspired by disco or have colour combinations that lead to eyeball soreness or bleeding.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: That\'s the way you do it , awesome ;-) lovely color contrast very stylish rom backed up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stays updated
reviews.comment: This is by far my favorite cs7 theme. Thx dev for the Google+ update...looks great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks nice!
reviews.comment: The 12:00 image is the alarm indicator. Turn off all alarms and it goes away. check boxes can be confusing and text boxes dark, but other than than amazing!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best I\'ve seen! 4 strs because some elemnts are confusing - switch colors of pressable Okay buttons so theyre bright, and the checkmarks are ambiguous
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great theme like the icons, nice work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Can you clean up the power notification widget like you did for the bionic pretty please? :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice but some color issues
reviews.comment: One obvious color issue for me was the black font in the notification drawer. It ends up being black on dark gray and barely readable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this theme
reviews.comment: But please change the twitter font color just like facebooks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Got the matching ADW theme and applied them both....BEST THEME EVER!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice but...
reviews.comment: When I applied the theme, I rebooted the phone to finalize the theme; well, the icons never changed... please help, DInc CM7.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Incredible
reviews.comment: Absolutely getting donate version... GREAT JOB dev... so slick. Literally putting off getting a new phone because this is too hot
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome theme
reviews.comment: For droid x
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Notification font colour
reviews.comment: I love the theme in general but I can\'t read notifications because the font is black on grey with jellybean 4.2. Please fix and this theme will be perfect!
reviews.author: Dan knight

reviews.title: Very Good Theme!
reviews.comment: Highly recommended!
reviews.author: A Google User
